title: How to See Who Viewed Your VSCO Profile & Photos

steps.title: Unfortunately, it's impossible to see who views your VSCO.
steps.content: Unfortunately, it's impossible to see who views your VSCO. Unlike Instagram Stories and TikTok , VSCO does not track who has viewed your profile. Also, no third-party apps can help in this case, as the feature is not built into VSCO. While this may come as bad news if you've been curious about your VSCO stalkers, this should be a relief if you've feared that you could get caught checking out somebody's profile. VSCO will also not notify you if somebody takes a screenshot of your photo or profile. The only way to find out who views your VSCO profile is to check your activity. The users who like and comment on your posts are the ones viewing your profile.

steps.title: Check your notifications for patterns.
steps.content: Check your notifications for patterns. VSCO notifies you each time you receive a like or comment on a post. You'll get a sense of who views your VSCO based on how often users interact with your posts. To view your comments and likes: Tap the Profile (smiley face) icon at the bottom of VSCO. Tap the menu icon in the top-left corner. Tap Activity .

steps.title: Look at your followers list.
steps.content: Look at your followers list. Your followers are your biggest fans, so keep an eye on your follower list. To find your followers in the VSCO app : Tap the Profile (smiley face) icon at the bottom of VSCO. Tap the menu icon in the top-left corner. Tap People . Tap the Followers heading to see who follows you. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Consider popular content on VSCO.
steps.content: Consider popular content on VSCO. Certain types of images on VSCO gain more popularity than others. If you want to increase your engagement on VSCO, consider the following types of posts: [2] X Research source Photography - With its powerful suite of photo editing tools , VSCO caters to talented photographers who want to share their work online. Post your best nature photos or human portraits to go viral on VSCO. Quotes - Like its comparable predecessor Tumblr , VSCO is home to several images of quotes. These quotes are quite popular on VSCO, so share a few on your page to expand your reach. Modeling photos - Everyone loves attractive photos, so if you are a model or a photographer of models, consider sharing your best photos on VSCO. These are very likely to get you more views.

steps.title: Add a profile picture and a bio.
steps.content: Add a profile picture and a bio. Accounts with more personalized info are more likely to gain traction on VSCO. Add a clear photo of yourself as your profile picture, and write a short bio so people know what you and your VSCO page are all about. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Engage with other users.
steps.content: Engage with other users. Comment on and like other users' photos on VSCO. This encourages them to return the favor and will raise your profile throughout the VSCO community.

steps.title: Share your profile on other social media platforms.
steps.content: Share your profile on other social media platforms. It may seem obvious, but one of the best ways to increase your engagement on VSCO is to link to your VSCO page from other social media sites. It is pretty common to put your VSCO link in your Instagram bio, but you can do the same on TikTok , Twitter, Facebook , Threads, and other platforms as well.
